raw.question: Chose hybrid HTTP API + PTY fallback approach
raw.chosen: Chose hybrid HTTP API + PTY fallback approach
raw.reasoning: HTTP API mode provides cleaner integration when opencode serve is running, but PTY fallback ensures compatibility when it's not available. This gives users flexibility without requiring opencode serve to be running.

retrospective.summary: Added OpenCode HTTP API integration with OpenCodeWrapper class, OpenCodeApi client, and typed RelayEvent definitions. The wrapper supports HTTP API mode (via opencode serve's /tui/append-prompt) with PTY fallback. Also added typed event definitions inspired by opencode's BusEvent pattern.
